text: Ri Dios man xukuy ta kimak ri angelibꞌ ri xemakunik xane xuꞌkꞌyaq bꞌik pa ri qꞌequꞌm, pa taq ri jul, e tzꞌapal chilaꞌ, kayeꞌm ri qꞌij ri kaqꞌat tzij pa kiwiꞌ.2:4 Ri tzij tyoꞌnel qꞌaqꞌ pa ri tzijobꞌal griego, are jun nimalaj jul ri sibꞌalaj nim qajinaq, pa juleꞌ taq paj tzij chik, kubꞌij chi ri jul maj ukꞌisik.
